text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, seeing as you're finally motivated, 
Structure aside for now, why don't we rehearse the basic steps?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
There we go! 
Yes, we're syncing up better now.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That's a new expression on her…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You've really improved! 
I guess you've started to relax around me?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fuji-san, you looked like you were enjoying it plenty yourself.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm just so happy to hear that your friends are excited too. 
It's debut season, so everyone's busy to begin with.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
True, lots of big important races are happening soon. 
And there are girls who won't get another shot after this.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That's why our part in the dance is so vital. 
For all the girls about to complete their time as students.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Past Droite events were all about making memories. It's an important bookend, So they can step into the next part of life.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Which is why, in my perspective… I want the Droite to refresh their feelings, And be a ceremony, for the benefit of every girl.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
For all the girls who haven't debuted yet, and the ones who've 
only just done so. Every day, they experience all sorts of 
things. They're working hard to achieve their goals and dreams.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But no one, no matter how strong… can run forever, without 
stopping for a break. It's time for them to catch their breath. 
They need to cross a finish line, in order to begin tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Which is why I want as many girls as possible to come. 
Especially the girls chasing their goals so fiercely… 
…that they haven't stopped running.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So that everyone can start the year fresh and have fun… 
I want to do absolutely everything I can.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
So that's it… 
I finally understand Fuji-san's motive.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: She really just wants to make the Droite fun for everyone. In that case,

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I'm really not cut out to be your partner. I'm not saying I don't 
want to, but we're totally different people.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Maybe you've misread me, But I don't care about anyone but myself. Giving everyone smiles and fun was never on my mind.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I don't think I've misread you at all. 
I mean, I knew it had to be you when…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, with you as my partner, I realized I could make 
everyone's smiles that much brighter.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: —Ugh…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: It sounds like it's for partying, but it's nothing but noise. I can't get a picture of what's danceable or not.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
And like, what am I doing in the first place? 
Here I am, putting together a whole playlist, 
All thanks to that prez spouting crap. It's all her fault.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
She called me in to do a DJ gig as !monad, 
But how the hell did she know it was me?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
I kept it all really private. Sometimes I need 
to vent after analysis, so I'd kill time and 
plug in samples. I was just messing around.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Like, I did sell a couple that turned out well. 
But nothing I posted went viral or big. 
So, how the hell…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
…Did she manage to sniff me out? If she knew all this time and 
didn't say anything, that's not a good look, at all. Nah, I guess 
it'd be worse if it were a coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: What was she thinking? DJing? Bet she pulled that one out of her ass. Like, I never once DJ'd for anyone else. But…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Wait, crap…!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
You want to give them your blessing? A push forward? 
No, you just want to feel like you did a good thing. 
If that isn't ego, I don't know what is.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I hadn't realized my own hubris. 
Sirius didn't do anything wrong. 
This time of year, I always weaken.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
All the girls completing their time as students, 
running for the last time… They smile, but beneath 
that… No, their tears fall freely.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Am I really doing everything out of ego? 
How can I wish them luck with such selfish reasoning…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: A lot on your mind, Kaichou?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki! I didn't expect to run into you. 
No, more importantly… You look stunning. Your 
beauty goes beyond words, I would say.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You're exaggerating! I would think the sight of 
you, lost in reflection… would be far more charming. 
If you don't mind, I can lend an ear.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
No, you're already in charge of the exhibition dance, 
And guiding the students, I can't ask more of you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I see, so you're worried about the Droite. But from my view, the amount of students participating… …seems to be much higher than past years. Am I wrong?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Is there some kind of delay with the DJ you invited? 
I did hear some opinions were shared in the suggestion app…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
If I remember right, "It doesn't match the dresses or the theme 
of the dance…" "…but I do want an excuse to make memories with my 
close friends." Was that it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, and I'm sure there are more who feel the same. 
I made that choice so they would have something to motivate them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I just wonder about reaching out to the composer whose name I 
received. No response yet… Maybe I should be searching within the 
students in the interim.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Makes sense. But there don't seem to be any hiccups in the 
progress? Which means… Kaichou, are you having second thoughts?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Say much more and I could mistake you for someone else. 
You've been behind me throughout all of this, so I'm surprised.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Whoops… Even so, whenever you decide it's the right time to 
unbottle your feelings, I intend to stay right behind you. Will 
you let me listen to your worries?
